departments.name: Human Resources
departments.description: Responsible for managing employee recruitment, hiring, training, benefits, and resolving workplace conflicts.

departments.name: Finance
departments.description: Responsible for managing financial transactions, budgets, forecasts, financial reporting, and ensuring compliance with financial regulations.

departments.name: Information Technology (IT)
departments.description: Responsible for managing computer systems, networks, software applications, and providing technical support to employees.

departments.name: Marketing
departments.description: Responsible for promoting the company's products or services, conducting market research, advertising, and branding.

departments.name: Sales
departments.description: Responsible for generating revenue by selling products or services to clients or customers.

departments.name: Customer Service
departments.description: Responsible for providing assistance to customers before, during, and after their purchase of a product or service.

departments.name: Operations
departments.description: Responsible for overseeing daily business operations, including production, logistics, inventory management, and quality control.

departments.name: Research and Development (R&D)
departments.description: Responsible for creating new products or improving existing ones through research, innovation, and development.

departments.name: Legal
departments.description: Responsible for providing legal advice, drafting contracts, handling disputes, and ensuring compliance with laws and regulations.

departments.name: Public Relations (PR)
departments.description: Responsible for managing the company's public image, media relations, press releases, and crisis communication.
